div.p: For the time being, we recommend looking at the include demos, which is located in the 'MokoiGaming/demos' directory, and the Hello World example game to get the hang of how Mokoi Games work. For a list of available functions please look at Game Scripting page.
If you having trouble with Mokoi or just want to leave feedback, please feel free to use the forums or the mailing list.
Content Packages are specially formatted packages containing Entities, Audio & Graphics, that help users start creating games and import new media.
